CustomField.formula: IF(MONTH(Anniversary__c)=2 && DAY(Anniversary__c)=29, IF(MONTH(Anniversary__c)>MONTH(TODAY()), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(Anniversary__c),28), IF(MONTH(Anniversary__c)<MONTH(TODAY()), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,MONTH(Anniversary__c),28), IF(DAY(Anniversary__c) >= (DAY(TODAY())), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(Anniversary__c)+1,1), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,MONTH(Anniversary__c),28)))) , IF(MONTH(Anniversary__c)>MONTH(TODAY()), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(Anniversary__c),DAY(Anniversary__c)), IF(MONTH(Anniversary__c)<MONTH(TODAY()), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,MONTH(Anniversary__c),DAY(Anniversary__c)), IF(DAY(Anniversary__c) >= (DAY(TODAY())), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(Anniversary__c),DAY(Anniversary__c)), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,MONTH(Anniversary__c),DAY(Anniversary__c))))) )
CustomField.label: TECH_NextAnniversary
